spaceman.title: Spaceman – Scene Replication
spaceman.description: A scene replication study focused on hard-surface modeling, material fidelity, and composition.
spaceman.details:
Created using: Unreal Engine 5, Maya, Substance Painter/Designer
Techniques: Modular hard-surface modeling, PBR authoring, lighting and lookdev

media.title: Main Shot
media.description: Primary render establishing the final look and composition.

media.title: Model Setup
media.description: Overview of the base meshes and scene assembly.

media.title: Outliner + Model
media.description: Scene hierarchy and modeling breakdown.

media.title: Material Reference
media.description: Material callouts and reference board used for PBR targets.

media.title: Final vs Reference
media.description: Side-by-side comparison of the final render and original art.

media.title: Model Closeup
media.description: Detail crop highlighting forms, bevels, and material breakup.

arrival-scene-replication.title: Arrival - Scene Replication
arrival-scene-replication.description: A scene replication study focusing on modular modeling, lighting mood, and material consistency.
arrival-scene-replication.details:
Software: Maya, Vray, Substance Painter, ComfyUI
Techniques: High-to-low poly baking, PBR material authoring, procedural generation, dynamic lighting

media.title: Main Shot
media.description: Primary hero frame establishing composition, mood, and the focal read.

media.title: Model Setup
media.description: A look at modular construction and placement for efficient scene assembly.

media.title: Model Setup 2
media.description: Alternate view of the modular kit and scene blockout.

media.title: Reference Image
media.description: Key reference used to match proportions, lighting, and texture language.

media.title: Volumetric ComfyUI Pass
media.description: Procedural enhancement pass focusing on volumetrics and atmospheric depth.

procedural-experiments.title: Procedural Geometry Experiments
procedural-experiments.description: A series of experimental procedural models and V-Ray renders exploring form, repetition, and material response.
procedural-experiments.details:
Created using: Maya/Houdini, V-Ray
Techniques: Procedural modeling, instancing, shader explorations, parametric variation

media.title: Experiment 01 (Main)
media.description: Primary render from the procedural geometry study.

media.title: Experiment 04
media.description: Variant exploring different repetition patterns and shading.

media.title: Experiment 02
media.description: Alternate form study with parametric adjustments.

media.title: Experiment 03
media.description: Material and lighting variation to stress-test forms.

hallway-study.title: Ornate Temple Corridor
hallway-study.description: A quick hallway study, modeled in Maya, procedurally textured in Comfy-UI
hallway-study.details:
Software: Unreal Engine, Substance Designer, ZBrush, ComfyUI
Techniques: High-to-low poly baking, PBR material authoring, procedural generation, dynamic lighting

media.title: Final Render
media.description: The primary cinematic shot showcasing the repeating architectural elements and the interplay of volumetric light and shadow.

media.title: Wireframe & Topology
media.description: A technical breakdown showing the optimized mesh topology of the modular assets used to construct the scene.

media.title: Lighting & Composition Overlay
media.description: An analysis of the scene's composition and lighting setup, highlighting key lights and post-processing volumes.

media.title: Procedural Texture Graph (ComfyUI)
media.description: The node-based graph from ComfyUI used to generate the intricate patterns and materials for the ceiling and pillars.

media.title: Moodboard & Key References
media.description: A collection of the primary architectural and artistic references that inspired the final design and mood of the environment.

plugin-1.title: Terrain Generator Plugin
plugin-1.description: Custom Maya plugin for procedural terrain generation with real-time preview.
plugin-1.details:
Language: Python, C++ API
Features: Real-time preview, Export to game engines
Compatibility: Maya 2020-2024
Performance: Optimized for large terrains

media.title: Plugin Interface
media.description: The main user interface showing terrain generation controls and real-time preview.

media.title: Live Demo
media.description: Real-time demonstration of terrain generation with parameter adjustments.

media.title: Generated Terrains
media.description: Various terrain examples created using different parameter settings.

media.title: Code Structure
media.description: Overview of the plugin architecture and key code components.

plugin-2.title: Procedural Foliage Plugin
plugin-2.description: A Houdini plugin for generating procedural foliage with customizable parameters.
plugin-2.details:
Language: Python, Houdini VEX
Features: Real-time preview, Export to Unreal Engine
Compatibility: Houdini 18+
Performance: Optimized for large forests

media.title: Plugin Interface
media.description: User interface of the procedural foliage plugin.

media.title: Live Demo
media.description: Demonstration of foliage generation in real-time.

plugin-3.title: Material Blending Plugin
plugin-3.description: A Substance Designer plugin for advanced material blending techniques.
plugin-3.details:
Language: C++, Substance Designer API
Features: Layer blending, Mask generation
Compatibility: Substance Designer 2021+
Performance: GPU accelerated
